fields.original_string:
private static final Pattern GCP_KMS_CRYPTO_KEY_PATTERN =
      Pattern.compile(
          String.format(
              "^projects/%s/locations/%s/keyRings/%s/cryptoKeys/%s$",
              URI_UNRESERVED_CHARS,
              URI_UNRESERVED_CHARS,
              URI_UNRESERVED_CHARS,
              URI_UNRESERVED_CHARS),
          Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE);
